long_description: Comfortable in the cockpit or out, the lightweight men's Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket is designed with the active paddler in mind. The Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket is supple, quiet and very packable; it maximizes freedom of movement thanks to its articulated design. It'll be dry on the inside thanks to Gore-tex(R) Paclite(R) fabric, an especially light, packable and breathable version of Gore-tex fabric. Adjustable spandex collar and cuffs smoothly seal out splashes, and adjustable drawcord waist prevents jacket from riding up in the cockpit. You can access the zippered left-sleeve pocket and store a key on the internal lanyard even if you're wearing a PFD. Factory sealed seams enhance dryness. The Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket for men enhances visibility via reflective piping.
short_description: Comfortable in the cockpit or out, the lightweight men's Kokatat Paclite paddling jacket is designed with the active paddler in mind.
